name: Contact Form By FULFILLs
author: FULFILLs

sections.description:
• Set up a contact form by simply inserting a shortcode into a page.
  • Add and edit fields in the contact form while reviewing the preview.
  • This plugin receive all of your visitors’ inquiries.
  • Reply to inquiries using this plugin
sections.installation:
1. From the WP admin panel, click “Plugins” -> “Add new”.
  2. In the browser input box, type “Contact Form By FULFILLs”.
  3. Select the “Contact Form By FULFILLs” plugin and click “Install”.
  4. Activate the plugin.

OR…

  1. Download the plugin from this page.
  2. Save the .zip file to a location on your computer.
  3. Open the WP admin panel, and click “Plugins” -> “Add new”.
  4. Click “upload”.. then browse to the .zip file downloaded from this page.
  5. Click “Install”.. and then “Activate plugin”.
sections.changelog:
1.1.0

  • Supported: Visitors can re-reply to your reply
  • Added: Inbox access rights settings

1.0.7

  • Added: Notification mail features

1.0.6

  • Fixed: A problem with line breaks not being applied
  • Added: A reply email template setting

1.0.5

  • Changed: translation projects in all of this plug-in

1.0.4

  • Supported: Showing admin menu bar
  • Supported: reCAPTCHA v3

1.0.3

  • Changed: Divide Setting Pages in two

1.0.2

  • Supported: Language Packs.

short_description: This is an all-in-one plug-in that allows you to not only set up an contact form, but also receive and reply to messages. Easily and Quickly.
description:
• Set up a contact form by simply inserting a shortcode into a page.
  • Add and edit fields in the contact form while reviewing the preview.
  • This plugin receive all of your visitors’ inquiries.
  • Reply to inquiries using this plugin
